subject: Re: (Unclaimed Fund Notifica
body:
Re: (Unclaimed Fund Notification)
I wish to bring to your notice that your payment file was brought to my desk, may I know your reason for abandoning your benefit as I have tried to reach all beneficiaries whose names are among the shortlisted files.
Reply back to me with your information as advised to reconfirm/avoid payment of funds to the wrong individual. N/B: I guarantee you that this process would be executed under a legitimate arrangement.
I am looking forward to your prompt response in this regard.
Sincerely,
George Hagenbuch.

subject: Re:   Re: (Unclaimed Fund Notifica
body:
Hello George Hagenbuch,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must admit, I'm a bit surprised by your message as I wasn't aware of any payment file under my name. Could you please provide more details about this? What kind of benefit are we talking about here? 

I appreciate your assistance and look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Daniel
